Text: Perfect- Thanks - See also for a good tookit to recover Data http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4640055/Runtime.GetDataBack.for_FAT.NTFS.v3.66.Incl.reg.file.rar

To use in Windows 7 64bits and possibly in 32bits also, the crack (reg file) has to be modified.
Edit the reg.reg file and instead of 
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Flash Memory Toolkit]
It should be [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Flash Memory Toolkit]

Worked for me after that.
